TopicTitle: Hosting a custom "Town of Salem" game every Friday!

Articles.Content:
A few years ago on Warcraft 3: Frozen Throne, I was a huge fan of a custom map called "Mafia", but the game's basis is nearly identical to the Steam game "Town of Salem". I always loved playing Mafia, but the game has slowly lost interest in it's community so I decided to ask if anyone from this one would be up for joining me every Friday night for a game over IRC of my own "custom" Town of Salem game  . If you're up for it let me know.

If you have any questions about the game, shoot me a PM!
